title: About {websiteName}
subtitle: Empowering global research with an open-source platform for archaeological and historical data

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: {websiteName} is dedicated to revolutionizing how researchers acquire, edit, and manage archaeological, historical, and prosopographical data. By providing an open-source, browser-based database system with customized forms and CIDOC-CRM mapping, we ensure data is interoperable, accessible, and compliant with FAIR principles, fostering global collaboration and discovery.

items.title: Open-Source Platform
items.description: {websiteName} is fully open-source, allowing researchers to customize forms, integrate new tools, and contribute to our codebase for community-driven innovation.

items.title: CIDOC-CRM Integration
items.description: Our platform automatically maps data to the CIDOC-CRM standard, ensuring interoperability with global cultural heritage systems and seamless data sharing.

items.title: FAIR Principles Compliance
items.description: {websiteName} adheres to FAIR principles, making data findable, accessible, interoperable, and reusable through unique identifiers, open APIs, and clear licensing.

items.title: Secure Data Management
items.description: With encryption and blockchain-based provenance tracking, {websiteName} ensures data security, authenticity, and traceability for reliable research.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: {websiteName} is powered by a global team of archaeologists, historians, data scientists, and developers committed to advancing open-access research and preserving cultural heritage.
